SEARCH
Package com.app.service.impl

Class CarServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.service.impl.CarServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CarService
public class CarServiceImpl extends Object implements CarService
Implementation of the CarService interface for managing and processing car data.

This service provides various methods to query, sort, and process collections of Car objects.

    • groupByAndMinMaxPriceStatistic

      public <T, U, W> Map<T,Statistic<W>> groupByAndMinMaxPriceStatistic(Function<Car,T> carMapper, Collector<Car,U,Statistic<W>> collectors)
      Groups cars by a specified property and calculates statistics (e.g., min, max, average) for a specified value.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the property value
      U - the type of the intermediate result of the collector
      W - the type of the statistics result
      Parameters:
      carMapper - a function to map cars to the property to group by
      collectors - a collector to calculate the statistics
      Returns:
      a map of property values to statistics
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the carMapper or collectors are null
